Reqruitment

We are looking for talented individuals in the following areas

Mechanical Engineer

In search of individuals with experience in rapid prototyping, systems modeling, marine design and mechatronics

Controls Engineer

Looking for experienced individuals in ROS, ciruit prototyping, control systems, RF signal processing, computer vision and nonlinear dynamics

Administrative Lead

Fundraising, outreach and logistics manager for the team

Timeline for the 2017-2018 Year

  • September

    Recruitment

    Recruitment will start on Imagine Day

  • October

    Team building

    Training, orientation, and goal alignment will be done

  • November-January

    Design

    This phase is where most of the design choices, and BOM will be decided in preperation for assembly

  • Febuary-May

    Testing and Competition Preperation

    Extensive testing on the system will be done as we prepare to travel to competition

  • Robosub
    Competition
    2018

Frame Design

We will develop and rapid prototype a robust, configurable frame to act as our system's test platform. By focusing on creating a simple yet reliable frame, we will expedite the process of integrating and testing electromechanical and electronic sub-systems.

Electromechanical Systems

Systems will need to be developed to navigate the craft, control camera movements, interact with objects, and fire torpedos at targets.

Python

Python will be one of the languages the projects will be built with

Open Computer Vision

Opencv will be an integral part of the project used in recognizing opejects under water.

Robotics Operating System

The Robotics Operating System will be our main platform for software development
